story_25_51000/2401_1001_0100_10: Hey, Sawyer, are you suuure this is a good idea?
story_25_51000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I know Cheren said to, like, keep our distance from
Master Lear, but I dunno...
story_25_51000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Well, he had a point. We do tend to be a little
indulgent with the young master.
story_25_51000/2401_1001_0400_10:
So if Cheren says a little separation is what’s
best for the young master...
story_25_51000/2401_1001_0500_10:
I don’t think we have much choice but to
believe him.
story_25_51000/2401_1001_0700_10: Ngh. I hope he’s all right...
story_25_51000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Gaaah! I can’t stand it! Young master, it’s killing
me to leave you like this! But I’ve gotta stand firm
for your sake!
story_25_51000/2401_1001_0900_10: Heeey! No fair! Here I was trying to be patient!
story_25_51000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Master Leeear! Just so you know, I’m way more
worried about you than Sawyer is!
story_25_51000/2401_1001_1100_10:
No, you’re not! My care for the young master runs
waaay deeper than yours and you know it!
story_25_51000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Young master! I believe in you! I know you’ll
become worthy of the crown!
